title: Project Planning
description: Define project scope, requirements, and timeline

title: System Architecture Design for FeedbackToGrowthConverter
description: Design the overall system architecture and components for the FeedbackToGrowthConverter system. The design will encompass the following key components: 1) Feedback Ingestion Module (responsible for receiving, parsing, and validating feedback from various sources), 2) Feedback Processing Module (processes feedback to extract insights and identify patterns), 3) Personal Development Plan Generation Module (generates actionable personal development plans based on the processed feedback), 4) User Interface Module (provides an intuitive and engaging interface for users to access their feedback and development plans), 5) Data Storage Module (ensures secure and scalable storage of user feedback, generated plans, and system data). The design will consider scalability, maintainability, modularity, and performance optimizations. A high-level architecture diagram and detailed descriptions of each component's responsibilities and interactions will be provided.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema and data models for storing user feedback, personal development plans, and related data

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for feedback input and plan viewing

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the core logic for feedback processing and plan generation

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate frontend and backend components, and perform thorough testing

title: Security Audit
description: Perform a comprehensive security audit of the system

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the production environment and deploy the system

title: Documentation
description: Create user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance manuals
